description:
- Made bass part more accurate. Not nearly entirely accurate, but should be at least a bit closer to the recording than previously
- Made a few changes to drums and vocals
- Made a few changes to the solo
- Removed the unnecessary doubling of the rhythm guitar outside of the solo. The lead guitar track now only has the solo on it.
- Made some changes to the bridge.
title: A Hard Road

description: (Hopefully) fixed drum sound on the first half of the song, added lyrics, added the third verse and chorus, and made the bassline better (definitely not 100% percent accurate, but definitely better than the god-awful original bassline)
title: A Hard Road
